title: Energy Investors’ 2022 Anthem: ‘Mo Money Mo Problems’
sub_head: The oil sector is bracing for another supercycle. For investors, it won’t just be about curbing the companies’ discipline but also their own demands.
body:
Oil-and-gas companies have 99 problems, but cash flow isn’t one. At least not yet.
In a sea of red for nearly all sectors this year, companies producing oil and gas are a rare spot of green. While the S&P 500 is down almost 4% year to date, oil-and-gas exploration companies in the index are up 25%.
